name: tyre - G16 Ploddin RoyalPurple
bio: Aloha! I'm tyre - G16 Ploddin RoyalPurple. In high school, I was voted most likely to work at NASA. Sometimes I daydream of a life full of eating until I loathe myself, salad, and siring for status. Purrhaps this is the beginning of a beautiful relationship.
